title: Imam said even after constructing mimbar Prophet used stick in Friday khutbah so it's OK to use now?
transcript: sh the Imam of our mosque told told us that even after constructing the M the prophet occasionally used stuff while giving in jum and during the period of KF Rashid the KH also sometimes used to hold a stick while giving kba that's why it's still permissible to hold a stick while giving kba so is this true she no it's not true and your IM doesn't know what he's talking about and Allah Knows Best
